careers.title: Software Engineer
descriptions: Collaborated as a back-end cloud engineer to build an AI-powered scheduling assistant application
Developed robust RESTful API endpoints using Node and PostgreSQL, ensuring seamless integration with front-end applications
Leveraged Google Cloud Platform (GCP) to deploy, manage, and scale server infrastructure
Integrated Google and Outlook Calendar APIs for dynamic user schedule analysis, identifying the user's optimal times for an enhanced user experience
Utilized pub/sub architecture to implement post-processing methods, ensuring effective and streamlined data handling after API interactions
Implemented Docker to containerize each API service, transforming the architecture into microservices
Orchestrated the construction and maintenance of a user-friendly web portal using React, showcasing personalized available time slots

careers.title: Alexa Skills Developer
descriptions: Developed Radio.com Alexa Skill using Node and Alexa SDK, which plays more than 300 radio stations to a million active users across the US
Implemented user-specified features with the use of DynamoDB to let the users have more personalized experience
Built a scheduled AWS Lambda function that manipulates internal API to update The Skill's station catalog once a day
Collaborated closely with the AWS team to build and test a new beta version of Alexa skill development, ensuring cutting-edge features and optimal performance

careers.title: Agile Software Engineer
descriptions: Participated in more than 5 different client-facing projects building both front-end and back-end web/IoT applications, by practicing Test-Driven Development
Developed data API endpoints that are being used on multiple platforms, built with Node/Express
Contributed to the development of an authentication API that is used on multiple platforms, built with Node/Express, Postgres and AWS Cognito
Built and improved two Alexa Skills from the scratch using AWS Lambda, DynamoDB and Alexa SDK
Revamped an internal web application that manages weekly project allocations for employees, using React, Spring Boot and SASS
Tweaked the marketing website using React, SASS and Contentful

careers.title: Front-End Developer
descriptions: Contributed to the development of a web-based financial platform using Ruby on Rails, jQuery and React
Created and maintained marketing website with the consideration of SEO and conversion funnel to generate MQLs
Implemented Salesforce/Pardot into the website to leverage smoother transition between marketing and sales
Built custom coded email templates to send out newsletters to attract possible clients

careers.title: Web Application Developer
descriptions: Developed web application platforms for clients from the scratch
Led front-end development efforts, crafting over 50 pages using Angular 1, JSP and SASS
Collaborated in building back-end implementations for database and computations using Spring and MySQL
Designed and implemented to be compatible with different versions of mobile, tablets, and browsers
